channel.title: Connection error while loading downloaded servers.. help please
channel.description: connection error retrying in 3..2..1...conection error retrying in 3.. it does this on all the servers i download, how do i get it to work? the one ive been trying along with a few others is r00nscape anyone else had this problem and fixed it? only thing that -works is the regular moparscape... it would help soo much if someone posted, thanks! im also new to mopar and stuff so try not to confuse me with all the technical stuff lol

item.description:

welll i downloaded r00nscape server and it does that countdown, do you know what i can do to fix it? like enter my own ip or somthing?

item.description:
